meanings.definition: A burrowing marsupial native to Australia.
meanings.sent1: The wombat dug a deep burrow to hide from predators.
meanings.sent2: I saw a cute wombat at the zoo last weekend.
meanings.sent3: Why did the wombat bring a shovel to the party? To dig up some fun!
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like a wombat tunneling through challenges.
meanings.sent5: The image of the wombat's burrow stayed in my mind, cozy and safe.

meanings.sent1: The wombat waddled slowly across the field.
meanings.sent2: My favorite animal at the sanctuary is the wombat.
meanings.sent3: The clumsy wombat tripped over its own feet and made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His stubbornness was as solid as a wombat's sturdy legs.
meanings.sent5: The wombat's adorable face and short legs made it instantly lovable.
